desc: Birendra Open Source Club (BOSC) organized an engaging orientation program for the new batch of IT students, with over 100 students in attendance. The event was graced by the presence of Assistant Campus Chief, Kishor Sir, as the chief guest. Several speakers gave insightful presentations on various topics, helping the newcomers understand the academic environment and opportunities available at Birendra Multiple Campus. LF Pemi Magar delivered a detailed presentation on college functioning, including an overview of the bachelor‚Äôs program, the roles of faculty members, and available sports activities.

We'll hear from our speakers, discuss on topics you want to discuss, introduce you to our open source repositories and guide you to make your first contributions. üöÄ We're providing a Zero To Hero Guide for you to contribute in this Hacktoberfest either in Worldwide Public Projects or BOSC's in-house Projects.

desc: Are you eager to learn the foundations of version control and collaboration in software development? Look no further! Our club is hosting a hands-on session where you'll discover the power of Git and GitHub. Whether you're a beginner or have some experience, this event is perfect for you. desc: The biggest educational event dedicated for +2 pass out students in Chitwan. This event is being organised with the aim of bringing together the students and Colleges of Chitwan. It will act as a bridge between those confused students and the faculties of University. Teachers and expertise of different field will be providing detailed knowledge about different fields in which students can build their career on. Let's Scooby-Doo this Grand Event!!!!
This event is packed with Introduction and Beginner level courses of JS. The session will cover all the basics of Javascript and how you can start your career as a Javascript Developer.

This event will guide you to start career as professional bug hunter. Our mentor will guide you the ways you may find bugs and how you can report bugs. The session will cover full information about current scenario of bug hunting. We have inspirational bug bounty hunters from Nepal as guests who will share their journey as bug bounty hunter and suggest you the basics of getting started.
The webinar will cover all the Essentials of Git & Github to get you started. Event will guide you to Opensource community & set your path as Opensource developer.
